alert.note: Alert for Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 1:40PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Orange and northwestern Osceola Counties through 230 PM EST... At 137 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poinciana, or near Intercession City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Saint Cloud, Buena Ventura Lakes and East Lake Toho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
